name: MedicareHelper
0:
”Alexa, open medicare helper”
”when are the enrollment dates for medicare”
”is hospital bed covered?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: medicare helper
des:
Medicare Helper acts as your guide to Medicare enrollment and services. Medicare Helper provides information on Medicare enrollment, services covered, cost of services, market price of services and procedures, and nearby physicians DME providers. Alexa users can ask about eligibility criteria for enrollment, enrollment dates, and get help with the annual Medicare enrollment process. Medicare subscribers can ask about services that are covered and inquire about out of pocket costs. Medicare subscribers can also ask about physicians and DME providers in their area who accept Medicare. Medicare subscribers can get help in understanding their Explanation of Benefits (EOB) and also inquire about procedure denial codes reported on received EOBs. 
Alexa user can inquire about: nursing facilities, home health care, long term facilities, dialysis centers, and hospitals that accept Medicare patients.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
